intro: Sphaerolobium crassirameum, commonly known as the hardy sphaerolobium, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Fabaceae family, which is characterized by its leguminous properties and pod fruits. The plant typically grows as a shrub, featuring small, rounded leaves and yellow flowers that bloom in spring. Its seeds are encased in a tough, leathery pod, and the plant is well adapted to arid and semi-arid environments.
